description.value: A fishing rod made by a master crafter, with a fine silk line, a platinum hook and custom sinker, and a high-quality bobber.  You can use a Rest Action and expend 1 Fishing Bait to catch a single unexceptional fish with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Instinct) Check. This fish can be cooked to feed a single creature.  When used with the Fishing Trade, it has a base fishing score of 3.
